tests.name: Controls respond within 16ms
tests.description: User interactions (clicks, drags, keypresses) respond immediately with no perceptible lag.

tests.name: Reset returns to defaults
tests.description: Reset button restores all controls, visualizations, and state to their initial default values.

tests.name: No UI overlap at any width
tests.description: Controls and display elements remain readable and accessible from 320px to 1920px viewport width.

tests.name: Keyboard navigation works
tests.description: All interactive elements can be accessed and operated using only the keyboard (Tab, Enter, Arrow keys).

tests.name: Animation maintains 60fps
tests.description: Animated elements run smoothly at 60 frames per second without dropped frames or stuttering.

tests.name: All specified states reachable
tests.description: Every state described in the specification can be achieved through user interaction.

tests.name: Cause-effect visible
tests.description: When users change inputs, the relationship between their action and the visual result is clear and immediate.

tests.name: Misconception addressed
tests.description: The simulation actively helps correct common misconceptions about the topic through visualization or feedback.

tests.name: Objective achievable in <=15min
tests.description: Students can complete the learning objective through interaction within a single 15-minute session.

tests.name: Scaffolding appropriate
tests.description: The simulation provides appropriate support for beginners without limiting advanced exploration.

tests.name: Feedback immediate and clear
tests.description: Users receive instant, understandable feedback about whether their actions are correct or effective.

tests.name: Runs in p5.js editor
tests.description: The simulation can be opened and executed in the p5.js web editor without modification.

tests.name: Iframe safe
tests.description: Runs correctly when embedded in a fixed-height iframe and sample iframe provided.

tests.name: Responsive design works
tests.description: Layout adapts correctly to mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes using CSS responsive techniques.

tests.name: Accessibility included
tests.description: ARIA labels, roles, keyboard support, and screen reader compatibility are implemented.

tests.name: Loads in <3 seconds
tests.description: Complete page load including all scripts, styles, and initial render takes under 3 seconds on standard connection.

tests.name: No console errors
tests.description: Browser developer console shows no JavaScript errors or critical warnings during normal operation.

tests.name: Interactions loggable
tests.description: User interactions can be captured as discrete events suitable for learning analytics systems.

tests.name: Completion detectable
tests.description: The simulation can signal when a student has achieved the learning objective or completed required tasks.

tests.name: Events deterministic
tests.description: Given the same inputs, the simulation produces the same outputs, enabling reproducible assessment.

tests.name: Timestamps available
tests.description: All logged events include accurate timestamps for time-on-task and sequence analysis.

tests.name: Errors distinguishable
tests.description: System can differentiate between student errors (learning opportunities) and system failures.
